detailsSection:
As an Office 365 Administrator that wishes to deploy Add-Ins within your Organization using Centralized Deployment you can use the Compatibility Checker to confirm which users are able to use the functionality. 
It will output a status report for each user in your Organization, whether they have a valid Office License, if they are setup correctly on Exchange and if they are Centralized Deployment ready
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating Systems
Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2016
installInstructionSection: Download and install the MSI. Documentation is available at https://aka.ms/centralized-deployment-guidance
